column1: Baby Barnaby's////Lo and behold..Turns out it was the hostess who would be our server and since she was wearing a shirt with three quarter sleeves
column2: each time she came out to take or order our check on us (rarely)
column3: she would run her hands up and down her arms in a dramatic signal to us that she did not appreciate being dragged out into the frozen tundra (it was 56 degrees by the way). She wasn't the least bit friendly
column4: would not return to refill our coffee and one of the entrees we ordered came out 15 minutes after the other ones and a little undercooked. But her show of irritation did not end with sub par service...
